section.title: Introduction
section.p: Derivation is a process with which you can easily expand your vocabulary. By taking adjectives, nouns or verbs and combining them with certain suffixes you can create new verbs with a meaning affiliated to that of the original word. Take te adjective xxx 'xxx' as an example: By adding a suffix we can form the xxx verb xxx 'xxx'.
The derived verbs are declined in infinite or finite forms, just as other verbs are. The inflectional endings are added after the derivational suffix.
